title: Sun in Bloom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery
description: Its second location, opened Feb 2014. Offers organic, gluten-free, vegan food with items like kale and seed salads, cupcakes, nut milks, and nori rolls. Kitchen is vegan, but offers dairy at the coffee bar. Sometimes opens later on weekends.
